tool_description: Sends backup monitoring alerts through multiple channels including email, SMS, and webhook notifications based on severity level and recipient preferences.

alert_message.description: The alert message content to send

email_recipients.description: List of email addresses to notify

sms_recipients.description: List of phone numbers for SMS notifications

webhook_urls.description: List of webhook URLs for integrations

error_messages: Invalid severity level: Use one of [info, warning, critical].
No recipients specified: At least one of email_recipients, sms_recipients, or webhook_urls must be provided.
Invalid email format: One or more email addresses are not properly formatted.
Invalid phone number: SMS recipients must be valid phone numbers with country codes.
Invalid webhook URL: All webhook URLs must be valid HTTP/HTTPS endpoints.
Notification delivery failed: One or more notifications could not be delivered, check recipient details.
usage: Provide alert_message and severity_level, then specify recipients through email_recipients, sms_recipients, or webhook_urls arrays based on your notification requirements.

notifications_sent.description: Total number of notifications successfully sent

failed_deliveries.description: List of recipient addresses/URLs where delivery failed
